thread.section_title: PGS Gold & Coin Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PGS Gold & Coin | pgsgoldandcoin.com
thread.title: Steen, Jack
thread.title_full: PGS Gold & Coin reviewed by Steen, Jack

author: Steen, Jack
title: Steen, Jack
text: Very helpful. I walked in with a coin that I needed help with to determine if it was a certain strike I was able work with Teresa and Aaron. Super helpful. Very friendly and also they have very good and competitive prices. I would highly suggest using PGS gold and coin for coins jewelry and bullion whether you are buying or selling. Very good business!
